data.actual_result: Calendar reopens shifted over to the left
data.expected_result: Calendar reopens in the same spot as before
data.short_description: Refocusing the calendar in search shifts it to the left
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a random server - Open search and select one of the date options - Close the calendar modal without closing out of search - Click on the search bar again to refocus the search - Observe the position of the calendar
